document_data.name: Shield of Egons
document_data.mainbody: The '''''shield of Egons''''' was a [[magic]]al [[shield]] that was associated with the [[Lathander]]ite [[Egon]] family.
document_data.Powers: The ''shield of Egons'' possessed a ''+3 [[Item enchantment|enchantment]]'' and improved an individual's ability to ''[[turn undead|turn]]'' [[undead]] creatures.
document_data.History: At some point, the shield came into the possession of man who later came to be the [[revenant]] known as [[Fanegonorom]].
